Text.Page:
The safest way to hunt mugato is with traps, but I ran out of frostvine. I'm not about to venture into barsicore territory to get more.

If you were to gather some frostvine, though, I'd pay you well.

That's terrific! I should be able to do brisk business and pelts thanks to these.

Would you mind running this frostvine coil to Soniata? I borrowed some from her a while back.
Oh, you can find frostvine all around the Screaming Snowfield. Grows out of the ground. Can't miss it.

What's this? Ah, I was worried I'd have to take a toe or two as payment.

Never let your debts fester. Thanks!
